alert.note: Alert for Greene; Lawrence (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 8:54PM EST until March 15 at 1:32AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of central Indiana, south central Indiana, southwest Indiana and west central Indiana, including the following counties, in central Indiana, Bartholomew, Johnson, Morgan and Shelby. In south central Indiana, Brown, Jackson, Lawrence and Monroe. In southwest Indiana, Greene. In west central Indiana, Owen. * WHEN...Until 900 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 852 PM EST, Flooding is occurring in the warned area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bloomington, Columbus, Shelbyville, Franklin, Martinsville, Bloomfield, Spencer, Nashville, Ellettsville, Edinburgh, Flat Rock, Worthington, Princes Lakes, Morristown, Trafalgar, Morgantown, Fairland, Clifford, Stinesville and Helmsburg. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
